title: From 0001 to 0007: How much you need to pay for these VIP car number plates
description: Post-pandemic, Delhi's obsession with fancy numbers, driven by numerology and superstitions, saw the 0001 plate sell for Rs 23.4 lakh. The 0009 and 0007 plates also fetched high bids. Managed by the Delhi transport department, monthly e-auctions see varying prices.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
cleaned_content: you can now subscribe to our economic times whatsapp channel
